tweet.text: (1/3) In June 1985, NSC Soviet specialist Jack Matlock worked up a series of briefing papers for President Reagan addressing the fundamentals of the Soviet system and attitudes of the Soviet people. Matlock called the series #SovietUnion101. Find in #FRUS: https://t.co/eIVGHVEI7n https://t.co/pe344ZawFK
